title: France's Injury Problem Grows
description:
The FC crew react to France's 2-0 victory over Austria and question Les Bleus chances at the World Cup as their injury list grows more by the day. Plus, the guys recap Kylian Mbappe's image rights issues with the French Football Federation and preview the United States' clash with Japan on Friday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Mbappe, Giroud lead France to win over Austria; Mbappe resolves image rights issues with FFF; Japan vs United States preview
